definition: white pottery (of Shang Dynastry 16-11th century BC)

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Meanwhile, white pottery-making techniques also developed to a high level in the late Shang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 同时，白陶的制作工艺也在商代晚期得到了高度发展。

sentences.english: White pottery and glazed pottery were produced.
sentences.chinese: 白陶和上釉的陶器也被制造出来了。

definition: black eggshell pottery (of the Neolithic Longshan culture)
celadon, classic Chinese style of ceramic glaze
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
water pot or goblet (for Chinese calligraphy)
Yangshao neolithic culture from the central Yellow river basin, with red and black pottery
